001
002package com.commercetools.api.client.error;
003
004import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpException;
005import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpRequest;
006import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpResponse;
007import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ResponseSerializer;
008import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.error.*;
009
010/**
011 * Creates an exception bases on the status code of the {@link ApiHttpResponse} with module specific exception for
012 * {@link BadRequestException} and {@link ConcurrentModificationException}
013 */
014public class ApiHttpExceptionFactory implements HttpExceptionFactory {
015    private final ResponseSerializer responseSerializer;
016
017    public ApiHttpExceptionFactory(ResponseSerializer serializer) {
018        this.responseSerializer = serializer;
019    }
020
021    public ResponseSerializer getResponseSerializer() {
022        return responseSerializer;
023    }
024
025    @Override
026    public ApiHttpException createClientException(ApiHttpRequest request, ApiHttpResponse<byte[]> response) {
027        final ResponseSerializer serializer = getResponseSerializer();
028        String message = "Client error response [url] " + request.getUri().toString() + " [status code] "
029                + response.getStatusCode() + " [reason phrase] " + response.getMessage();
030
031        switch (response.getStatusCode()) {
032            case 400:
033                return new BadRequestException(response.getStatusCode(), new String(response.getBody()),
034                    request.getHeaders(), message, response, request, serializer);
035            case 401:
036                return new UnauthorizedException(response.getStatusCode(), new String(response.getBody()),
037                    request.getHeaders(), message, response, request, serializer);
038            case 403:
039                return new ForbiddenException(response.getStatusCode(), new String(response.getBody()),
040                    request.getHeaders(), message, response, request, serializer);
041            case 404:
042                return new NotFoundException(response.getStatusCode(), new String(response.getBody()),
043                    request.getHeaders(), message, response, request, serializer);
044            case 409:
045                return new ConcurrentModificationException(response.getStatusCode(), new String(response.getBody()),
046                    request.getHeaders(), message, response, request, serializer);
047        }
048        return new ApiClientException(response.getStatusCode(), new String(response.getBody()), response.getHeaders(),
049            message, response, request);
050    }
051
052    public static HttpExceptionFactory of(ResponseSerializer serializer) {
053        return new ApiHttpExceptionFactory(serializer);
054    }
055}
